\clearpage{}

\liststepwise{
\begin{itemize}
\item \step{The code in the practicals should be run interactively

\begin{itemize}
\item read the instructions
\end{itemize}
\item }\step{The application of Taylor series to analysing accuracy was
not clear

\begin{itemize}
\item I think the notes are as clear as I can make them but I didn't present
the material well. Happy to give more one to one help
\end{itemize}
\item }\step{What does FTBS mean?
\item }\step{What are the pros and cons of the spectral method

\begin{itemize}
\item I would also like to talk about the pros and cons of finite elements,
spectral elements, discontinuous Galerkin, finite volume, mesh adaptivity,
different grids of the sphere, different time-stepping schemes, different
types of advection scheme, Met Office versus ECMWF, UK versus North
America, ... TAKE ME TO THE PUB AND BUY ME CIDER!
\end{itemize}
\item }\step{More on interpreting Fourier power spectra ...}
\end{itemize}
